# No header id

{::options:: unusedvar="val"}
{::options:: auto_ids="true"}

# with header id

<div>
some <span>*para*</span>
</div>

{::options:: parse_block_html="true" parse_span_html="true"}

<div>
some <span>*para*</span>
</div>

{::options:: auto_ids="false" filter_html="p em"}

<p>
This is <em>some</em> text.
</p>

{::options:: footnote_nr="10"}

Some text[^ab].

[^ab]: Some text.
